titleStmt.title: Nevvs from Ostend, or, The Souldiers loving letter to his sweet- heart in London with her kind answer to the same ... : tune of, The Seamans adieu to his dear, or, Ile [sic] go to the captain, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, J. Wright, and J. Clark,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
